sir david não poupou críticas à política ambiental do presidente george w bush que se recusa a apoiar o protocolo de kyoto tratado para reduzir as emissões de dióxido de carbono que intensificam o efeito estufa	intensificam	 causam::0.11861934512853622	 é::0.02365451119840145	 reduzem::0.019482627511024475	 reduz::0.01925094611942768	 aumentam::0.017461981624364853	 sobre::0.01168769784271717	 tem::0.011568465270102024	 protege::0.011554352939128876	 aumenta::0.0114644356071949	 afetam::0.01134609617292881	 têm::0.010199169628322124	 incluem::0.010168091394007206	 combate::0.009908327832818031	 controlam::0.009740435518324375	 influenciam::0.009363855235278606	 são::0.008975500240921974	 envolvem::0.00873446837067604	 podem::0.008224326185882092	 provocam::0.007738782092928886	 diminuem::0.007734532002359629
quem não conseguir esgotar o armazenamento de diesel puro não pode misturar com o b2 porque o produto ficaria fora de especificação	esgotar	 fazer::0.06248685345053673	 utilizar::0.058891162276268005	 manter::0.03577384352684021	 usar::0.03412730619311333	 trocar::0.028945796191692352	 reduzir::0.027300149202346802	 obter::0.025290153920650482	 substituir::0.024846453219652176	 retirar::0.014320463873445988	 realizar::0.013390572741627693	 comprar::0.012738439254462719	 aumentar::0.01036639604717493	 eliminar::0.01021689921617508	 testar::0.009551720693707466	 controlar::0.009373265318572521	 evitar::0.009137710556387901	 ter::0.008200494572520256	 apenas::0.007803980261087418	 garantir::0.0071665821596980095	 suportar::0.007082224357873201
com capacidade para 283 presos abriga atualmente 541 condenados quase o dobro do previsto	atualmente	 1::0.3422669470310211	 2::0.2235344648361206	 3::0.08134515583515167	 4::0.03920890763401985	 6::0.03723343834280968	 5::0.02859146147966385	 7::0.01911589503288269	 9::0.013066974468529224	 12::0.010556154884397984	 8::0.010417900048196316	 11::0.007693408522754908	 10::0.006028681993484497	 aproximadamente::0.005853908136487007	 quase::0.0052483705803751945	 r::0.004989419132471085	 14::0.004848915617913008	 13::0.0044474429450929165	 17::0.00423601595684886	 22::0.004068767186254263	 18::0.004012048710137606
